sentences.english: The blue-white brilliants are the stones of the "finest water" .
sentences.chinese: 蘭白色的寶石是光澤度最好的鑽石。

sentences.english: Death: for Syria is not a penalty, on the contrary is an accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 死，對於亞斯蘭並非是一種懲罰，相反是一種成全。

sentences.english: If couldn t hand in the finished product, he wishes will be dashed.
sentences.chinese: 屆時若交不出成品，蘭博士的心願就要落空了。

sentences.english: Zhaolan was married to an actor last month.
sentences.chinese: 上個月趙蘭和一個演員結婚了。

sentences.english: And here I'd heard a Lannister always pays his debts.
sentences.chinese: 在這兒我聽說蘭尼斯特有債必還。

sentences.english: His name was Mr Frankland, and he lived about four miles to the south of the Hall.
sentences.chinese: 他是福蘭克蘭先生，住在莊園以南約四英里遠的地方。

sentences.english: “Without them, we couldn’t hold our own in the Bundesliga,” says Mr Rangnick.
sentences.chinese: “沒有他們，我們的德甲就沒法繼續”蘭尼克如是說。

sentences.english: Earl Rambert's response to my offer came today.
sentences.chinese: 今天蘭貝爾特伯爵關於我的要求有了回覆。

sentences.english: In 1893, Henry Ziegland ended a relationship with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 1893年亨利希格蘭與其女友分手了。

sentences.english: Hm. Located in Barcelona's architecturally stunning La Rambla neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，位於巴塞羅那的著名建築蘭布拉大道附近。

sentences.english: Fruit anatomy of Lonicera edulis and its taxonomic significance.
sentences.chinese: 蘭靛果忍冬的果實解剖及其分類意義。

sentences.english: Lambada, a fast modern dance originally from Brazil, also named dance next to skin.
sentences.chinese: 蘭巴達，源自巴西的快步現代舞，也叫貼身舞。

sentences.english: The guards saw you with Lentil. Up at the penthouse.
sentences.chinese: 警衛看見了你和蘭緹一起，上到頂樓。

sentences.english: Santorum hopes to appeal to social and religious conservatives within the Republican Party.
sentences.chinese: 山託蘭希望吸引共和黨中社會和宗教保守派選民。

sentences.english: Nahor, you shall be punished by tending to the sheep for Abram and Haran.
sentences.chinese: 納曷爾，你被罰替亞伯蘭和哈蘭放羊。

sentences.english: The results showed that this technology can effectively detect the genetic variation of Oncidium.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，該技術能有效用於文心蘭品種的變異檢測。

definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
